Talk_1_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I'd love to make a quick trip out to
Kakariko Village to buy some things.

But it's a small village to the southeast,
and it's fairly secluded and hard to find.
I always get lost looking for it...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Although I guess now I could use those
huge <clr:0000>Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>as a <clr:0000>landmark<clr:ffff>, so maybe
I'm fretting over nothing.
Talk_1_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>I've wanted this outfit for a while. Never
thought I'd eventually be able to get it
at Lookout Landing.
Anyway, it's made with Sheikah tech!


Word is you're <clr:0000>way quieter <clr:ffff>when you run
around in this gear.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>So...that means catching horses would be
easier, for one thing.

And just think about all the surprise
attacks you could unleash on monsters!

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>But even if I sold the <clr:0000>ore <clr:ffff>I've got, I still
wouldn't be able to afford it.

Maybe I should go rooting around in a
<clr:0000>cave <clr:ffff>for ore.
Talk_1_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:TalkPositive_01>This <clr:0000>Hylian armor series<clr:ffff> has caught your
eye too?
Talk_1_6:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>The design is so cool, and it fits like a
glove! It's popular with travelers too,
which means it's a must for adventuring.
Talk_1_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>This outfit is pretty great, but I've been
obsessing over a different one lately.

Specifically, the <clr:0000>stealth series<clr:ffff> outfit.
They sell it over in the Sheikah area,
<clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Word is that it uses Sheikah tech!


I guess wearing it <clr:0000>makes you super quiet
when you move<clr:ffff>.
Talk_1_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>The outfits here aren't bad.


But I've been drooling over the stealth
clothing that makes you <clr:0000>super quiet when
moving around<clr:ffff>.
Except it's only sold in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>...


<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>If I had that set, I'd be catching horses
left and right. Not to mention all the
<clr:0000>surprise attacks<clr:ffff>. The possibilities!
It's no wonder everyone wants
that clothing.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Kakariko is small and secluded, so I
always get lost trying to find my
way there.
I suppose now there's those <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>
that'll serve as a <clr:0000>landmark<clr:ffff>, so I'm sure
I'll have no problems next time.
Talk_1_7:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>In your case, you should just put
something on. Anything, really.

You're fine walking around like that in
here, but I wouldn't suggest it outside.
Talk_1_33:

this outfit in a <clr:0000>specific area<clr:ffff>. Now?

What a dream! Just look at the quality on
this. The QUALITY. Makes you wanna get
